item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 16, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Generate impressive-looking terminal output, look busy when stakeholders walk by (288 points | 77 comments)
2. Show HN: My high school team's space probe (18 points | 2 comments)
3. Show HN: Nash, I made a standalone note with single HTML file (357 points | 85 comments)
4. Apple's long-lost hidden recovery partition from 1994 has been found (150 points | 27 comments)
5. DeepSeek focuses on research over revenue in contrast to Silicon Valley (81 points | 52 comments)
6. Sign in as anyone: Bypassing SAML SSO authentication with parser differentials (242 points | 87 comments)
7. Implementing "Tennis for Two" using op amps (2024) (16 points | 2 comments)
8. Milk Kanban (363 points | 147 comments)
9. Command A: Max performance, minimal compute – 256k context window (10 points | 2 comments)
10. Wyvern's Open Satellite Feed (161 points | 5 comments)
11. Finding Signal in the Noise: Machine Learning and the Markets (Jane Street) (131 points | 94 comments)
12. Career Advice in 2025 (175 points | 90 comments)
13. Lynx is the oldest web browser still being maintained (5 points | discuss)
14. Strengthening AI Agent Hijacking Evaluations (32 points | 7 comments)
15. More pro for the DEC Professional 380 (featuring PRO/VENIX) (23 points | 4 comments)
16. Lego says it wants to start to bring video game development in-house (97 points | 52 comments)
17. Evidence that Neanderthal and Homo sapiens engaged in cultural exchange (88 points | 53 comments)
18. They're Close to My Body: A Hagiography of Nine Inch Nails and Robin Finck (2020) (114 points | 54 comments)
19. ASK HN: How to engineer a JavaScript to Python migration? (3 points | 6 comments)
20. Mandelbrot Set Explorer (63 points | 20 comments)
21. Sunsethue – Forecast Sunset Beauty (20 points | 3 comments)
22. Sunset Geometry (2016) (91 points | 11 comments)
23. Show HN: A personal YouTube frontend based on yt-dlp (250 points | 162 comments)
24. Show HN: Aiopandas – Async .apply() and .map() for Pandas, Faster API/LLMs Calls (49 points | 12 comments)
25. What Bikini Atoll Looks Like Today (2017) (158 points | 79 comments)
26. Learning physics while monitoring vibrations of the Earth with seismic phenomena (8 points | discuss)
27. AutoHete: An Automatic and Efficient Heterogeneous Training System for LLMs (38 points | discuss)
28. Lemma for the Fundamental Theorem of Galois Theory (126 points | 33 comments)
29. Parahelp (YC S24) Is Hiring Founding Engineers (SF) ( | hide)
30. Arbitrary-Scale Super-Resolution with Neural Heat Fields (143 points | 49 comments)
